org.megatome.frame2.log
Class LoggerFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.megatome.frame2.log.LoggerFactory

public class LoggerFactory
extends Object

The LoggerFactory generates instances of the Logger instances as used by the framework. The Logger implementation is normally set through the Frame2ContextListener.

Method Summary
static Logger instance(String name)
          Creates a logger for the given name corresponding to the type set in setType, otherwise returns a StandardLogger (if available) or a cruddy StdoutLogger.
static void setType(String className, ClassLoader classLoader)
          Sets the Logger implementation for use by the framework.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

instance

public static Logger instance(String name)
Creates a logger for the given name corresponding to the type set in setType, otherwise returns a StandardLogger (if available) or a cruddy StdoutLogger.

Parameters:
name - The log instance name to create
Returns:
Logger instance

setType

public static void setType(String className,
                           ClassLoader classLoader)
                    throws LoggerException
Sets the Logger implementation for use by the framework. The factory will use the provided class loader to generate the instances.

Parameters:
className - The fully qualified name of the Logger implementation. The class must implement the Logger interface and provide a public constructor that takes a string argument, which is its name.
classLoader - The class loader to use.
Throws:
LoggerException
